Content: In another community project, intended to further enhance goodwill and reconciliation, 7 Sri Lanka National Guard (SLNG) troops of the 652 Brigade under the 65 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi provided a sumptuous meal to more than 20 kids in the Haridas Kudirippu Pre-school in Akkarayankulam on Monday (10). Considering their economic plight and hardships, 652 Brigade troops pocketed out their own money to spend for the meal in a symbolic gesture of mutual understanding and cooperation. Commanding Officer, 7 SLNG, a few Officers and a group of 17 troops supported the project.
